statements: DELETE FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data WHERE campaign_id = 1001 AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data WHERE total_clicks > 1000 AND total_conversions < 50;
DELETE FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE campaign_id = 1 AND clicks > 100;
DELETE FROM CampaignPerformanceData WHERE campaign_id = 1 AND campaign_name = 'Campaign A';

DELETE FROM campaign_engagement WHERE campaign_id = 10 AND likes > 100;
